<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","version","schema"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"name":{"type":"string"},"version":{"type":"string","pattern":"^\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+$"},"schema":{"type":"object","description":"JSON Schema definition","additionalProperties":true},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"SchemaDefinition"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
